title: Mulligatawny soup with leftovers
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '2 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon minced root ginger', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (or to taste)', '750ml chicken stock', '400ml light coconut milk', '2 tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '300g cooked turkey (or chicken)', '2 handfuls torn spinach leaves', '15g fresh coriander, chopped (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
